ViewObject.Name: PrmOpportunityAgreementDataView
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT PrmOpportunityAgreementData.ID, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.PRM_OPPORTUNITY_ID, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.CONTRACT_ID, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.TEMPLATE_ID, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.NOTES, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.FORM, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.STATUS, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.TYPE, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.DIVISION, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.EFFECTIVE_DATE, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.TERM_LENGTH, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.CANCELLATION_NOTICE_TERM, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.EXPIRATION_DATE, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.AUTO_RENEW_TERM_MONTHS, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.SIGNATORY, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.CONTRACT_SIGNED_DATE, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.RIGHTS_TO_BE_RETAINED, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.EXCLUSIVITY, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.CONTENT_MASTER_OWNER, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.TECHNICAL_CONTACT_ID, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.AGREEMENT_CONTACT_ID, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.QA_CONTACT_ID, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.ROYALTY_CONTACT_ID, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.CURRENCY, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.PAYMENT_FREQUENCY, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.INTERIM_PAYMENT_TERM_DAYS, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.ANNUAL_PAYMENT_TERM_DAYS, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.CREATED_BY, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.CREATED_DATE, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.LAST_UPDATED_BY, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.LAST_UPDATED_DATE, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.Assignment, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.Royalty_Bearing, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.Guarantee, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.Fair_Treatment_Clause, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.Issue_Edition_Coverage, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.Complete_Content_Set, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.Warranty_And_Indemnification, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.Governance, TraxContractTemplate.TEMPLATE_NAME, concat(AgreementContact.FIRST_NAME, concat(' ',AgreementContact.LAST_NAME)) AGREEMENT_NAME, concat(QAContact.FIRST_NAME, concat(' ',QAContact.LAST_NAME)) QA_NAME, concat(RoyaltyContact.FIRST_NAME, concat(' ', RoyaltyContact.LAST_NAME)) ROYALTY_NAME, concat(TechnicalContact.FIRST_NAME, concat(' ',TechnicalContact.LAST_NAME)) TECHNICAL_NAME, PrmOpportunity.CONTENT_OWNER_ID, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.AUTO_RENEWAL, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.AUTO_ADD FROM PRM_OPPORTUNITY_AGREEMENT_DATA PrmOpportunityAgreementData INNER JOIN PRM_OPPORTUNITY PrmOpportunity ON PrmOpportunityAgreementData.PRM_OPPORTUNITY_ID = PrmOpportunity.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TRAX_CONTRACT TraxContractTemplate ON PrmOpportunityAgreementData.TEMPLATE_ID = TraxContractTemplate.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TRAX_CONTACT AgreementContact ON PrmOpportunityAgreementData.AGREEMENT_CONTACT_ID = AgreementContact.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TRAX_CONTACT QAContact ON PrmOpportunityAgreementData.QA_CONTACT_ID = QAContact.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TRAX_CONTACT RoyaltyContact ON PrmOpportunityAgreementData.ROYALTY_CONTACT_ID = RoyaltyContact.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TRAX_CONTACT TechnicalContact ON PrmOpportunityAgreementData.TECHNICAL_CONTACT_ID = TechnicalContact.ID
